insert into five_business_advance_collect_detail (collect_id, dept_id, dept_name, apply_money, company_money, real_money, seq, creator, creator_name, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified, remark, advance_id, declare_type ) values (#{collectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{advanceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{declareType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update five_business_advance_collect_detail set collect_id = #{collectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_name = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_money = #{applyMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_money = #{companyMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, real_money = #{realMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seq = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator_name = #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, advance_id = #{advanceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, declare_type = #{declareType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, collect_id, dept_id, dept_name, apply_money, company_money, real_money, seq, creator, creator_name, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified, remark, advance_id, declare_type from five_business_advance_collect_detail where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, collect_id, dept_id, dept_name, apply_money, company_money, real_money, seq, creator, creator_name, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified, remark, advance_id, declare_type from five_business_advance_collect_detail
